text: Jordan Thompson was the defending champion but lost in the quarterfinals to Quentin Halys. Janko Tipsarević won the title after defeating Quentin Halys 6–7(5–7), 6–3, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Kunming Open - Men's Singles Category:2017 in Chinese sport Category:Tennis tournaments in China
title: 2017 Kunming Open – Men's Singles
